dialog.text: Hey Bob. How’s it going?
My name is Dave.
Oh right. My name is Bob.
Anyway. Welcome to Hot Bob’s Molten Supplies and Ice Cream Shop.
It is wise to keep ice cream near molten hot lava?
Absolutely not, that’s why we got it priced to sell fast.
Originally I lived in the ice caves but no one wanted ice cream when it’s freezing
so I moved down here.
Do you have better sales down here?
Sadly no.
I see. Well, in any case. I need some supplies. It’s too hot for me to travel further.
Oh, right then. I got just what you need. Unfortunately it’s in the ice freezer and I don’t have the key.
You lost the key to your own freezer?
Oh no, of course not. My daughter took it when she was kidnapped.
I’m beginning to detect a trend.
Yep. Kidnapped by you know who.
Indeed, I do know. And now you need me to save her.
If it wouldn’t be too much of a bother. I’m pretty sure he took her down to level five of the dungeon.
Well, I’m on my way there anyway. So about those supplies.
All the supplies are in the storage, but here’s the last ice-cream I have. It’s mint chocolate chip, the coolest flavor around.
I hate mint.
It’s that or a bucket of lava.
I’ll take the ice-cream.
